discussion_comments.comment_body: because these already behaved like public properties, they can now just _be_ public properties. `messages` only can't because we have to make sure sets to it are immutable (by spreading the incoming array)
The value is set in the constructor. Would prefer `private strictMode: boolean` to prevent the impression that the `false` setting here matters.
avoid export `*` - we need to control what we re-export
aha, will make sure to do in future 🙏
this is strange - can we directly import (from provider utils or the file)?
this is so that the imports `test.d.ts` and `test/index.ts` don't clash, otherwise it'll pickup the wrong file

can't you replace it with:

```
import { convertArrayToReadableStream } from '@ai-sdk/provider-utils/test';
```
ideally for imports we avoid barrel files as much as possible and go for the original source
